text: [Jiehun zhihou], nimen dang jin shou [mei ri wu ci de] bai gong, tebie shi zhongjian de bai gong [zhu][ji bu li. Mei ri de wu ci bai gong tongyang zhongyao, yin bu li xi renmen shisu gongzuo zui mang de shijian, yin'er tixing renmen zhuyi, bie hushi ci fan bai gong].[Libai shi] nimen dang qiancheng wei an la suli.
